npcs.name: Dustinz
utterances: In spite of the cost of living, it's still quite a popular item.

npcs.name: Kamilis Shrezil
utterances: Hello, friend!  I'm here to teach interested people a little bit about how to harvest crafting materials, and how to craft tradeskilled items.  Are you interested?

npcs.name: Nunai Oehu
utterances: I'm sorry, until you have chosen a specialty in your craft I do not have any work orders for you.  Come see me when you're more practiced in your trade.

npcs.name: Wholesaler Kazi
utterances: Only traitors to the Overlord would pass up a bargain like this.  You're not a traitor, are you?

npcs.name: Yokla
utterances: I'm sorry, until you have chosen a specialty in your craft I do not have any work orders for you.  Come see me when you're more practiced in your trade.
